title: Soldier

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot someone at night, attacking them. 1 use.
- Reload your ammo, gaining an extra use of the above ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Reloading is usable at day or night.
- If used at day, you cannot be voted or vote, or it fails.
- If used at night, you cannot be visited by any negative utility role, or it fails.
- With the Necronomicon, since you don't know how to use magic, you instead get someone to use it to give you steroids. Your attack rampages and you no longer need to reload (infinite uses to your ability).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Coven.
